text: Bye Bye Dubai is a 2016 Indian Odia-language comedy drama film directed by Basanta Sahoo and produced by NRI businessman Akshaya Kumar Parija. The music is released by Amara Muzik. ==Cast== *Sabyasachi *Archita *Buddhaditya *Papu ==Production== Filming for Bye Bye Dubai took place in Hyderabad, Ramoji, and Odisha, as well as Dubai, where they shot some of the film's song sequences. == Soundtrack == == Critical reception == ==References== Category:2010s Odia- language films Category:Indian films Category:Films shot in Hyderabad, India Category:Films shot at Ramoji Film City Category:Films shot in Odisha Category:Films shot in Dubai
title: Bye Bye Dubai
